channel.title: Edge4Pkers (New)(Looking For Mods)
channel.description:
Hello this is my 1st time hosting a rsps it is a-
-Spawn Pking Server -Starter Set -Edge -Minigames To Unlock Special Gear -PK Leaderboard -Overpowered sht for mod+ -Pk item Shop -Loads Of Items in edge Store (CBA TO SPAWN SOMETIMES)
-First 5 to join will get auto 200pk tokens, 25kills headstart and have a large chance of being admin
Yours Sinceraly
Jack (Owner)
DL-*

item.title: Edge4Pkers (New)(Looking For Mods)
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Server Development does not mean Server Advertisement.

Good luck running your corrupt server where anyone has a chance at gaining a position of trust simply by virtue of them being the first to login. Seniority should not warrant them that right and I foresee that your server will have corruption.

EDIT: I noticed that youâ€™ve posted this thread within Server Downloads as well. There is no board on Moparscape for advertisement, if you insist on advertising your server please use the server toplist provided.

Read full topic
